statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, survey_response FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level = 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, satisfaction_level FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level < 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_level DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_description FROM customer_feedback WHERE survey_response IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE satisfaction_level > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_description LIKE '%improve%';
SELECT customer_id, feedback_date, satisfaction_level FROM customer_feedback WHERE survey_response = 'Positive';
SELECT satisfaction_level, COUNT(*) AS feedback_count FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY satisfaction_level;
SELECT MAX(satisfaction_level) AS highest_satisfaction, MIN(satisfaction_level) AS lowest_satisfaction FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT feedback, feedback_id FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%positive%';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id FROM survey_data;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM customer_feedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_feedback > 3;
SELECT survey_response, survey_question FROM survey_data WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback JOIN survey_data ON customer_feedback.customer_id = survey_data.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM surveys;
SELECT survey_id, questions FROM surveys WHERE survey_name='Customer Satisfaction';
SELECT rating, customer_id FROM customer_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_id, demand FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand > 100 ORDER BY forecasting_accuracy ASC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(survey_id) AS total_responses FROM surveys GROUP BY survey_name HAVING total_responses > 10;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand) AS total_demand, AVG(forecasting_accuracy) AS avg_accuracy FROM demand_forecasting WHERE demand > 100 GROUP BY product_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback cf JOIN surveys s ON cf.customer_id = s.survey_id WHERE cf.rating >= 4;
SELECT survey_name, jsonb_array_elements(responses->'answers') AS answers FROM surveys WHERE survey_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT survey_date, survey_response FROM surveys WHERE customer_id = 2001 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT forecast_date, forecast_value, forecast_accuracy FROM demand_forecasting WHERE forecast_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecast_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT survey_response, survey_date FROM surveys WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY survey_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age, customer_location FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND customer_location LIKE '%City%';
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback JOIN surveys ON feedback.customer_id = surveys.customer_id WHERE feedback.rating < 3 ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_location FROM customer_demographics WHERE customer_location = 'New York' OR customer_location = 'Los Angeles' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults WHERE response_score < 3 ORDER BY survey_date;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM CustomerFeedback GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(rating) > 4;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY survey_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT location, COUNT(customer_id) AS customer_count FROM CustomerDemographics GROUP BY location ORDER BY customer_count DESC;
